en.title: Who is the subject of this case?
en.line1: The subject of a case may be you, or the person who you are submitting this tribunal from on behalf of.

cy.title: What is the contact number of the named applicant? (Welsh)
cy.line1: This can be the number of a trusted friend if the applicant does not have a private number. (Welsh)
